LABEL: Interval
rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with an extent or duration

LABEL: Appropriate Body
rdfs:comment: Accredited organization which is able to express a formal opinion on Requirements, expressing them in DocumentedEvidence (mostly called Certificates), and if necessary making them dependent on Restrictions, which shall be fulfilled.

LABEL: Case
rdfs:comment: A clearly separated part of a Request, identified clearly by its Scope(s). Each Case has an individual PermissionType as objective. A Request consists out of minimally one Case.

LABEL: Compliance
rdfs:comment: Regroups the result of a compliance check on a specific section of an applicable Requirement as registered in Documented Evicence. If needed, links this examined section to a specific Restriction.

LABEL: Documented Evidence
rdfs:comment: Issued by an AppropriateBody, it is the summary of its formal and accredited verification process, enabling the receiver (RequestingBody) to issue a Request for a Permission to the PermittingBody.

LABEL: Permission
rdfs:comment: Issued by a PermittingBody, it enables - mostly because of legal frameworks in place - the RequestingBody to execute the processes covered under these requirement frameworks.

LABEL: Permitting Body
rdfs:comment: Within its legally recognized mandate, this Body is able to receive DocumentedEvidence as submitted in a Request and based upon it, issue a Permit to the RequestingBody for the activities covered by the mentioned legislation.

LABEL: Request
rdfs:comment: Issued by a Requesting Body to a PermittingBody, and supported by at least one Case, while being supported by the necessary DocumentedEvidence, it intends to enable the reception of a Permission.

LABEL: Requesting Body
rdfs:comment: Within its legally recognized role, this Body is able to express the intention to act under the condition of reception of a Permission. The intended action being covered by legal or standardized Requirements to fullfil, this Body will present all required information, as verified by the Appropriate and examined by the Permitting Bodies, to the latter in order to receive the mentioned Permission.

LABEL: Requirement
rdfs:comment: A legal/standardised collection of rules, which must be verified independently to be met in the context of a Permission Request, and of which the measure of compliance is expressed in DocumentedEvidence, with or without added Restrictions.

LABEL: Restriction
rdfs:comment: Issued by an Appropriate Body in connection with its documented evidence on a certain requirement, it contains all aspects to take into account in order to accept the DocumentedEvidence as proof, enabling the scope of the Permission. It is possible that the Restriction limits the Permission in the same way.

LABEL: Scope
rdfs:comment: A collection of Scopes together defining a Case. Scope is mostly the specific material object of the Case, where the Case groups them together.

LABEL: certifies
rdfs:comment: within its accredited competencies, can express an opinion whether a (legal or standardized) requirement is met. This relation must be accompanied by DocumentedEvidence to formalize this opinion and eventually Restrictions if it is met only partially.

LABEL: checked compliance
rdfs:comment: The Compliance checks having been documented by the Appropriate Body in the DocumentedEvidence.

LABEL: checked section
rdfs:comment: For a Compliance check, the section of the Requirement which was individually checked by the Appropriate Body. The sections in scope of the verification are registered under each Requirement itself.

LABEL: closes
rdfs:comment: within the accredited competencies of the issuer of the DocumentedEvidence, confirms that the evidence shows the Requirements to be fulfilled, completely or in presence of a Restriction.

LABEL: concerns
rdfs:comment: holds as material content, constitutes, embodies the material components of the Scope.

LABEL: defines case
rdfs:comment: is covered by, included in

LABEL: delivers
rdfs:comment: within its accredited mandate, issues in a traceable and qualitative manner for reuse in a Permission process

LABEL: grants
rdfs:comment: within its legally recognized mandate, issues, delivers in a traceable and qualitative manner, such that the receiver is able to act within the authorisation cases and its verified documentation

LABEL: compliant
rdfs:comment: For the verified section of a Requirement: true when fully compliant, false in other cases (in which a clarifying Restriction is possible)

LABEL: issues
rdfs:comment: transmits with the intention to be allowed to act according to a legally verified process

LABEL: permission type
rdfs:comment: the detailed process which constitutes this Case's permission conditions

LABEL: regarding
rdfs:comment: belonging to, and when being respected, then also fulfilling

LABEL: request for
rdfs:comment: aiming to be enabled to act as covered by the Permission and its conditions, by receiving

LABEL: requests
rdfs:comment: aims to be allowed to act according to a legally verified process, by receiving

LABEL: sections
rdfs:comment: section(s) of the requirement to which individual compliance can be registered by the Appropriate Body

LABEL: status
rdfs:comment: the status of the Request as it is being treated by the PermittingBody

LABEL: submitted for
rdfs:comment: supporting, holding evidence of compliance in order to enable the Permitting Body to verify and permit

LABEL: submitted in
rdfs:comment: The submission of a permission or a documented evidence to a case

LABEL: supports
rdfs:comment: is part of, inherently constitutes

LABEL: valid
rdfs:comment: valid during a certain time

LABEL: with restriction
rdfs:comment: when taken into account in the final act to be permitted, can be accepted under the condition that the conditions of the Restriction are fully answered to
